Description:
URAFLOW X 240
CPU Water cooler for Gamers

The AURAFLOW X 240 is an all-in-one RGB liquid CPU cooler with a 240mm radiator built for CPU cooling.
Adjustable RGB Lighting

The LED light on the pump head and two RGB cooling fans are adjustable to match your PC build.
Sync with Motherboard

The RGB lighting can sync with the motherboard via a 12V 4PIN connector.
Compatibility

    Intel LGA2066/2011/1700/1200/1151/1150/1155/1156
    AMD AM5/AM4

cpu water cooler rgb cpu cooler am4 cpu liquid cooler lga1700 cooler aio cooler 240mm
	

cpu water cooler cpu cooler am4 lga1700 cooler cpu liquid cooler cpu fan cpu air cooler
	

cpu water cooler rgb cpu liquid cooler 240mm aio cooler rgb cooler lga1700 cooler
Dual 120mm RGB Fans

It comes with two PWM fans with RGB light to provide better cooling performance and low-noise operation.
	
MOTHERBOARD RGB SYNC

The RGB lighting on the pump cover and fans can sync with the motherboard with the 12V 4pin connector.
	
Match Your PC Builds

The RGB light makes the PC's builds colorful and bright. It can not only ensure excellent heat transfer but also brings visual enjoyment.
Label: Disipador Líquido ID-COOLING AURAFLOW X 240
